unpublishedAction.name: getSalesforceOpportunities
jsonPathKeys:
`SELECT Amount, Account.Id, Account.Name, Account.Stripe_ID__c, Owner.Name, Contract_Start_Date__c, Contract_End_Date__c, ARR__c FROM Opportunity WHERE StageName = 'Closed Won' AND 
(CALENDAR_YEAR(Contract_End_Date__c) > ${moment().format("YYYY")} OR 
(CALENDAR_YEAR(Contract_End_Date__c) = ${moment().format("YYYY")} AND CALENDAR_MONTH(Contract_End_Date__c) >= ${moment().format("M")})) Order By LastModifiedDate Desc`
